#summary Move or Swap Archers between Targets
= Move or Swap Archers =

[Contents Contents] [Printing Next]

Sometimes it's necessary to move an Archer, even during a competition.

[http://cpbserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/setup1.jpg]

On the SetUp page enter the 2 target numbers and click "Move".

[http://cpbserver.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/images/move.jpg]

This will swap over the archer(s) on the 2 targets.
